and the MUFFIN

An adventure with just one character does not look very exciting isn't it? But luckily for muffin man, he is not alone. The muffin is actually surrounded with a real dream team. And now, the things are getting interesting! This section will be dedicated to the story behind the scene, the uncensured story of the muffin man and the dream team.
